data.title: TV SERIES
data.text:
You will never breathe the same again! Reintroduce yourself to Father God, Yahweh, the Creator of everything in Part 1 of this inspiring series. Breath of Life: The First Breath is Part 1 in an unforgettable biblical creation account, based on the best-selling book Breath of Life: Three Breaths that Shaped Humanity. An original and inspiring series directed by The Kooman Brothers (She Has A Name), The First Breath features The Chosen TV Series Creator Dallas Jenkins, and Korey Cooper and Jen Ledger of Skillet. It also features an inspired narration by Trevor McNevan of Thousand Foot Krutch (TFK) and Kim Walker-Smith of Jesus Culture Music. Additional expert contributors include Rabbi Kirt Schneider of Discovering The Jewish Jesus, author Tiffany Bluhm, artist Mindi Oaten, astronomer Dr. Hugh Ross and biochemist Dr. Fazale Rana from Reasons to Believe.

The second breath that God breathed upon humanity came in the form of redemption when Jesus breathed His last breath on the cross. Breath of Life: The Second Breath is Part 2 in an unforgettable biblical creation account, based on the best-selling book Breath of Life: Three Breaths that Shaped Humanity. An original and inspiring series directed by The Kooman Brothers (She Has A Name), The Second Breath features spoken word artist Blair Linne along with Andrew Hyatt (director of Paul: Apostle of Christ), Ken Shigematsu (best-selling author), and returning contributors including The Chosen TV Series Creator Dallas Jenkins, Korey Cooper and Jen Ledger of Skillet. It also features an inspired narration by Trevor McNevan of Thousand Foot Krutch (TFK) and Kim Walker-Smith of Jesus Culture Music. Additional expert contributors include Rabbi Kirt Schneider of Discovering The Jewish Jesus, author Tiffany Bluhm, artist Mindi Oaten, astronomer Dr. Hugh Ross and biochemist Dr. Fazale Rana from Reasons to Believe.

The third breath that God breathed upon humanity in the form of the Holy Spirit, is the most far reaching breath that continues to shape life on earth as we know it. Breath of Life: The Third Breath is Part 3 in an unforgettable biblical creation account, based on the best-selling book Breath of Life: Three Breaths that Shaped Humanity. An original and inspiring series directed by The Kooman Brothers (She Has A Name), The Third Breath features The Chosen TV Series Creator Dallas Jenkins, Korey Cooper and Jen Ledger of Skillet, spoken word artist Blair Linne along with Andrew Hyatt (director of Paul: Apostle of Christ), and Ken Shigematsu (best-selling author). It also features an inspired narration by Trevor McNevan of Thousand Foot Krutch (TFK) and Kim Walker-Smith of Jesus Culture Music. Additional expert contributors include Rabbi Kirt Schneider of Discovering The Jewish Jesus, author Tiffany Bluhm, artist Mindi Oaten, astronomer Dr. Hugh Ross and biochemist Dr. Fazale Rana from Reasons to Believe.
